data.title: Lindsey Rose, MD
data.meta_description: Dr. Lindsey Rose is a board-certified family medicine physician
data.text:
Dr. Lindsey Rose is a board-certified family medicine physician with clinical interests in preventive medicine, sleep medicine, chronic disease management and womenâ€™s health. Dr. Rose received her medical degree from University of North Carolina School of Medicine at Chapel Hill. She completed her family medicine residency at Atrium Health Carolinas Medical Center in Charlotte.

Dr. Rose embraces a holistic approach to medicine with a central focus on the patient-provider relationship and disease prevention through optimization of sleep, nutrition, fitness, mental health and appropriate screening. She feels that this connection is key for identifying personal health goals and developing individualized plans to improve health and prevent disease.

Outside of work, Dr. Rose enjoys DIY projects, kayaking, exploring wineries and local history and continuing education.
